headline: Should You Buy, Sell or Hold NVIDIA Stock Post Strong Q2 Earnings?
summary: NVDA posts record Q2 results with soaring Data Center revenues and strong AI demand, but premium valuation suggests a hold stance.

headline: Qualcomm Declines 8.3% in Past Year: Time to Rethink QCOM Stock?
summary: Qualcomm stock slid 8.3% in a year as China trade woes, rising R&D costs and tough competition weigh on margins despite Snapdragon and auto gains.

raw.headline: Qualcomm Declines 8.3% in Past Year: Time to Rethink QCOM Stock?
raw.summary: Qualcomm stock slid 8.3% in a year as China trade woes, rising R&D costs and tough competition weigh on margins despite Snapdragon and auto gains.

headline: Abu Dhabi-backed G42 looks beyond Nvidia for chip suppliers at its AI campus: Semafor
summary: The group is negotiating with major American technology firms, including Amazon's AWS cloud, Microsoft, Meta, and Elon Musk's xAI to become tenants at the data center, with Google the furthest along in negotiations, according to the report.  G42 is looking to chipmakers AMD, Cerebras Systems, and Qualcomm to supply some of the computing capacity at the campus, the report said.  The tech firms, AMD, Cerebras, Qualcomm, and G42 did not respond to Reuters' requests for comment, while an Nvidia spokesperson declined to comment.

headline: Is QUALCOMM Stock Underperforming the S&P 500?
summary: QUALCOMM has struggled to keep up with the broader S&P 500 Index over the past year, and analysts are fairly confident about its future prospects.

headline: $22.5 Bn Wi-Fi Chipset Market Analysis by IEEE Standard, Band, MIMO Configuration, End-use Application and Vertical - Global Forecast to 2030
summary: The global Wi-Fi chipset market is anticipated to grow from USD 22.50 billion in 2025 to USD 29.86 billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 5.8%. This growth is driven by the surge in high-speed internet demand across various applications, fuelled by the proliferation of smart devices and advanced Wi-Fi standards like Wi-Fi 6, 6E, and 7. headline: 1 Volatile Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Find Risky
summary: Market swings can be tough to stomach, and volatile stocks often experience exaggerated moves in both directions. While many thrive during risk-on environments, many also struggle to maintain investor confidence when the ride gets bumpy.

raw.headline: 1 Volatile Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Find Risky
raw.summary: Market swings can be tough to stomach, and volatile stocks often experience exaggerated moves in both directions. While many thrive during risk-on environments, many also struggle to maintain investor confidence when the ride gets bumpy.
